EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_Cloud Native Workshops_Q216.Confirmation - Chicago
EmailTemplate.subject: You're Confirmed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://pivotal.io/event/cloud-native-workshop/nj]]> Thank you for registering for the upcoming Cloud Native Workshop in Chicago. See event details below:
Date: March 29, 2016 Time: 9:00 AM - 12:00 PM Location: Pivotal Chicago, Capone Conference Room, 222 W Merchandise Mart Plaza, Suite 1214, Chicago, IL 60654
{{my.Save the Date Chicago}}
Questions? Please contact us via email <[[mailto:pivotal-operations@pivotal.io]]> or visit our website <[[http://pivotal.io/event/cloud-native-workshop/nj]]>.
